Sometimes works on the highway, or some large deliveries, require a road to be closed temporarily to general traffic. Such closures require a traffic regulation order issued by the highway authority.

All costs involved for both the closure and diversion signing will have to be met by the person requesting the closure.

As there is a legal and consultative process to be undertaken, at least enter amount notice of closure is required.

Please complete and return the Road Closure Application link to online form.

Your completed form should be mailed to the address shown below. If you have any queries when completing the form, please contact us using the details above.
